00043 unsigned int InOutputAttribute::GetPeerId()
00044 {
00045     if ( comTool )
00046     {
00047         return comTool->GetServiceId();
00048     }
00049     return peerId;

00052 void InOutputAttribute::GenerateShortDescription(SimpleString& str)
00053 {
00054   GenerateHeaderDescription(KindToStr(), GetName(), str);

00056 
00057 void InOutputAttribute::GenerateLongDescription(SimpleString& str)
00058 {
00059     // Estimate max size
00060     // "<tcp>" + tmp + "</tcp>" + "<udp>" + tmp + "</udp>" + "<peerId>" + tmp+ "</peerId>" +
00061     // "<peers>" + {"<peer>"+ tmp +"</peer>" ...} + "</peers>" + "</" + KindToStr() +">"
00062 
00063     int MaxLenForBuffer = 100; // almost "<tcp>" + tmp + "</tcp>" + "<udp>" + tmp + "</udp>" + "<peerId>" + tmp+ "</peerId>"
00064 
00065     // Retrieve number of connected peer
00066     SimpleList<unsigned int> listPeer;
00067     comTool->GetListPeerId(listPeer);
00068 
00069     // Ok, if need, so
00070     // "<peers>" + listPeer.GetNumberOfElements() * "<peer>"+ tmp +"</peer>" + "</peers>" + "</" + KindToStr() +">"
00071     if ( listPeer.GetNumberOfElements() >= 2 )
00072     {
00073         MaxLenForBuffer = 7 + listPeer.GetNumberOfElements() * 25 + 8 + 50;
00074     }
00075 
00076     TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp(MaxLenForBuffer);
00077     char * WhereToWrite = (char*)tmp;
00078     int SizeAvailable   = MaxLenForBuffer;
00079 
00080     GenerateHeaderDescription(KindToStr(), GetName(), str, false);
00081 
00082     if ( GetTcpPort() != 0 )
00083     {
00084         WhereToWrite += snprintf(WhereToWrite, SizeAvailable, "<tcp>%d</tcp>", GetTcpPort());
00085         SizeAvailable -= 22;
00086     }
00087     if ( GetUdpPort() != 0 )
00088     {
00089         WhereToWrite += snprintf(WhereToWrite, SizeAvailable, "<udp>%d</udp>", GetUdpPort());
00090         SizeAvailable -= 22;
00091     }
00092 
00093     snprintf( WhereToWrite, SizeAvailable, "<peerId>%8.8x</peerId>", comTool->GetServiceId() );
00094     str += (char*)tmp;
00095 
00096     AddTagDescriptionToStr(str);
00097 
00098     WhereToWrite = (char*)tmp;
00099     SizeAvailable   = MaxLenForBuffer;
00100 
00101     WhereToWrite += snprintf(WhereToWrite, SizeAvailable, "<peers>" );
00102     SizeAvailable -= 7;
00103 
00104     for( listPeer.First(); listPeer.NotAtEnd();  listPeer.Next())
00105     {
00106         WhereToWrite += snprintf(WhereToWrite, SizeAvailable, "<peer>%08x</peer>",  listPeer.GetCurrent());
00107         SizeAvailable -= 21;
00108     }
00109     snprintf(WhereToWrite, SizeAvailable, "</peers></%s>",  KindToStr().GetStr() );
00110 
00111     str += (char*)tmp;
00112 
00113     listPeer.Empty();
00114 }

00116 void InOutputAttribute::GenerateRecordData(SimpleString& str)
00117 {
00118   // OmiscidTrace( "in InOutputAttribute::GenerateRecordData\n");
00119   // OmiscidTrace( "str before : |%s| \n", str.GetStr());
00120   // OmiscidTrace( "Tcp port (%p) : %d %d \n", comTool, GetTcpPort() ,comTool->GetTcpPort());
00121   TemporaryMemoryBuffer tmp(30);
00122 
00123   int tcp, udp;
00124 
00125   if(comTool == NULL)
00126     {
00127       tcp = tcpPort;
00128       udp = udpPort;
00129     }
00130   else
00131     {
00132       tcp = comTool->GetTcpPort();
00133       udp = comTool->GetUdpPort();
00134     }
00135 
00136   if(tcp != 0)
00137     {
00138       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%d", tcp);
00139       str = tmp;
00140     }
00141   if(udp != 0)
00142     {
00143       snprintf(tmp, 30, "%d", udp);
00144       str = str + "/" + tmp;
00145     }
00146 
00147   // OmiscidTrace( "str after : %s \n", str.GetStr());
00148   // OmiscidTrace( "out InOutputAttribute::GenerateRecordData\n");
00149 }

00151 const SimpleList<unsigned int>& InOutputAttribute::GetListPeerId()
00152 {
00153   if(comTool)
00154     {
00155       listPeerId.Empty();
00156       comTool->GetListPeerId(listPeerId);
00157     }
00158   return listPeerId;
00159 }

00161 const SimpleString& InOutputAttribute::KindToStr() const
00162 {
00163     switch(kindOfInput)
00164     {
00165         case AnInput:
00166             return input_str;
00167 
00168         case AnOutput:
00169             return output_str;
00170 
00171         case AnInOutput:
00172             return inoutput_str;
00173 
00174         case UnkownConnectorKind:
00175             return unknown_str;
00176     }
00177 
00178     return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00179 }

00181 void InOutputAttribute::ExtractDataFromXml(xmlNodePtr node)
00182 {
00183   //parcours attributs
00184   xmlAttrPtr attr_name = XMLMessage::FindAttribute("name", node);
00185   if(attr_name)
00186     {
00187       SetName(SimpleString((const char*)attr_name->children->content));
00188     }
00189 
00190   //parcours child tag
00191   xmlNodePtr cur_node = node->children;
00192   for(; cur_node; cur_node = cur_node->next)
00193   {
00194       if (cur_node->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE)
00195       {
00196           SimpleString cur_name = (const char*)cur_node->name;
00197           if( cur_name == "description" )
00198           {
00199               SetDescription( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children) );
00200           }
00201           else if( cur_name == "formatDescription" )
00202           {
00203               SetDescription( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children) );
00204           }
00205           else if ( cur_name == "tcp" )
00206           {
00207               SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)atoi(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr()) );
00208           }
00209           else if ( cur_name == "udp" )
00210           {
00211               SetUdpPort( (unsigned short)atoi(XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr()) );
00212           }
00213           else if ( cur_name == "peerId" )
00214           {
00215               sscanf( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(cur_node->children).GetStr(), "%x", &peerId );
00216           }
00217           else if ( cur_name == "peers" )
00218           {
00219               xmlNodePtr node_peer = cur_node->children;
00220               for(; node_peer; node_peer = node_peer->next)
00221               {
00222                   if((node_peer->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) && strcmp((const char*)node_peer->name, "peer") == 0)
00223                   {
00224                       unsigned int ConnectedPeerId;
00225                       sscanf( XMLMessage::ExtractTextContent(node_peer->children).GetStr(), "%x", &ConnectedPeerId );
00226                       AddPeer(ConnectedPeerId);
00227                   }
00228               }
00229           }
00230           else
00231           {
00232               OmiscidError( "Unwaited Tag : %s\n", cur_name.GetStr() );
00233           }
00234       }
00235   }
00236 }

00273 int InOutputAttribute::GetTcpPort()

00298 void InOutputAttribute::AddPeer(unsigned int peer_id)
